Nikomu chyba nie trzeba przedstawiać najpopularniejszego FPS'a ostatnich 20 lat. Klasyczna, taktyczna strzelanka w lepszej oprawie graficznej i nowymi, ciekawymi trybami.

This is the greatest game of all time. There are definitely things that are needed. But in comparison to all games being made, it is a very well made game. No glitches. No toxicity. No rage. No Life.

10/10.

Um dos melhores FPS de todos os tempos ,ótimo jogo que pode até mesmo te viciar por alguns meses. Recomendo muito pra quem gosta de um FPS com competitivo e com muita dificuldade que é a parte toxica da communidade do jogo no Brasil, infelizmente algumas muitas pessoas tem um comportamento ofensivo que pode afetar a sua jogatina se você for uma pessoa sensível a xingamentos e que tem autoestima baixa já que algumas pessoas podem te xingar bastante por apenas 1 jogada errada que você fez. Tirando isso o jogo é de qualidade e muito viciante extremamente recomendado !
you hate it but you still come back to play the game everytime

Совет для новых игроков, от пожилого деда этой игры, с 10 ваками начиная с 14 года.
Дабы не деградировать, не стоит играть в эту игру, НО есть и плюсы, изучение новых языков, ответы на вопросы куда ушёл ваш отец и состояние вашей матери, повидать далёкие страны название которых вы узнаете если зайдёте в игру)
This is one of the original MODs I started playing right after I discovered Half-Life. It's just a legendary and most loved FPS game out there. There's no comparison.
Jogo muito bom, para quer quer jogar com os amigos, indico.
Gra jest swietna ale nie polecam grania bez kupionego prima bo duzo jest odpalonych graczy

[h1]CSGO[/h1]
This one word gives me shiver down my spine as I rewind countless hours of pure fun and enjoyable memories, however this word also hides an endless amout of pain and suffering, that could make you quit this game in second.
But even if it makes you suffer and lose, you will want to get back and prove that you can do better than the last time, that you are better than the 10 y.o. kid with bad MIC, that you are better than the guy with private profile and 100% HS ratio.
[b]At the end of the day this game will stay in your heart, but not just for it's never-ending new discoveries and legendary game mechanics, but on top of it for it's great community that I'm so proud that I can be part of.[/b]

Ну что я могу сказать, 700+ часов в игре. За это время, узнаешь, какими бывают люди, от лютого токсика и человека, употребляющие наркотические вещества, до мимимишного гей... (кхм). 
Нужно набирать пати и играть только так, другого варианта нет. Собасна и все, рот ипал я эту игру, но она классная.
